com.pos.device.emv

Class EMVHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.emv.EMVHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEMVHandler

    public class EMVHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEMVHandler
    This class implements interface IEMVHandler,It contains all method for operating EMV almost.
    Author:
    PanJianPing 2016/4/5 17:52:54
